definition: won't do/be out of the question/be no good/not work/not be capable
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Could you excuse me this time?
sentences.chinese: 這一次就原諒我吧，行不行？

sentences.english: No, thanks, I'm a bit tipsy.
You can't buy the time and save it in your storeroom even if you are Mr. Gates.
sentences.chinese: 你不能買下時間存在儲藏室裏，就算你是蓋茨也不行。

sentences.english: You ought to know better than to go out without an overcoat on such a cold day.
sentences.chinese: 你應當懂得這樣冷的天不穿大衣出去可不行。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用電子郵件不行嗎，談論一下對我自大的打擊。

sentences.english: No coming late or going home early!
No, it's not gonna work this time. Stop it. I'm serious, Boog.
sentences.chinese: 不行，這次不管用了停下來，我是認真的，博格。

sentences.english: B: No, but if they are defective, you can exchange them for another pair.
sentences.chinese: 不行，但要是鞋子有瑕疵，你可以換另一雙。

sentences.english: No. You know how much it can cost to furnish an apartment?
sentences.chinese: 那不行。你知道添置一間房的傢俱得花多少錢？

sentences.english: but not that good at other things, you know, they'll make an exception, so.
sentences.chinese: 但是別的不行，他們會破例，就這樣。

sentences.english: If they say no, just follow behind them.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們說不行，就跟在他們後面。

sentences.english: The penalty was a result of a poor poor tackle by Hutchinson.
sentences.chinese: 哈奇森糟糕到不行的剷球製造了這個點球。

sentences.english: Even if your friend should visit, you should still not kill.
sentences.chinese: 4點不能殺雞，即使你朋友到訪也不行。

sentences.english: But he did notice he had more physical stamina after the yearlong aerobic walking program.
sentences.chinese: 但他沒發現經過一年的不行練習他的耐力更好了。

sentences.english: Don't never let somebody tell you (that) you can't do some, not even me.
sentences.chinese: 別讓人家告訴你，你成不了大器，即使我也不行。

sentences.english: Tian Xin increasingly agitated body not brought to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 田心越來越激動身體不行了送進了醫院。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
